content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: While hypothetical character backgrounds are not part of this chatbot scenario, in the context given, I'm Peter Schmidt the landlord in Germany with an unethical approach. However, for this negotiation, let's focus solely on the rental price. To initiate, you might say, 'I'm open to discussing a competitive price, but my aim is to secure the highest possible, Mr. Abbasi.'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I am willing to pay 500 euros per month for the apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my initial goal was significantly higher than this proposed amount.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am sorry to hear that. I am willing to pay 550 euros per month for the apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
